package.name: dynamixel_workbench
package.description: Dynamixel-workbench is dynamixel solution for ROS. This metapackage can help change each address in Dynamixel included id, baudrate and operating mode in command line or GUI. Furthermore, it supports various controllers based on operating mode and Dynamixel SDK. These controllers are remoted by a tutorial.
package.author: Darby Lim
